text.mine-lights.about.title: MineLights
text.mine-lights.about.support_intro: Shouldst this mod find favour in thy sight, pray, consider supporting its creation:
text.mine-lights.about.kofi: Procure for me a draught on Ko-fi
text.mine-lights.about.description: MineLights is a Minecraft Fabric mod, which doth bring forth shimmering RGB illuminations unto the Java Edition of Minecraft.
option.mine-lights.enableMod.tooltip: Toggleth all shimmering effects from this very mod.
option.mine-lights.autoStartServer.toolt:
If thou shouldst enable this, the mod shall launch the server
anon, if it be not running. The server's EXE must lie within the
'MineLights' coffer, inside thy .minecraft demesne.
option.mine-lights.refresh_devices.label: Refresh the Roll of Instruments
option.mine-lights.refresh_devices.toolt:
Shouldst thou connect a new instrument whilst the game is afoot,
mark this and save, that it may appear upon the roll.
option.mine-lights.restart.label: Restart the Server
option.mine-lights.restart.tooltip:
If the server's spirit doth fail or cease to answer,
check this box and save to breathe life into it once more.
option.mine-lights.restart_admin.label: Restart the Server as a Magistrate
option.mine-lights.restart_admin.tooltip:
Employ this if workings such as Mystic Light prove false.
Doth require the authority of a magistrate.
option.mine-lights.device.header: Pray, enable or disable thy chosen instruments below:
option.mine-lights.clear_disabled.label: Re-enable All Instruments
option.mine-lights.clear_disabled.toolti: Mark this box to cleanse the list of all forsaken instruments.
option.mine-lights.enableSaturationBar.t:
Displayeth thy food's saturation upon F9-F12.
It shifteth to thy air when thou art plunged beneath the waves.
option.mine-lights.enableExperienceBar.t: Displayeth thine experience upon the keys from 1 to 0.
option.mine-lights.enableLocatorBar.tool: Displayeth the bearing of other players or waypoints upon the keys from 1 to 0.
option.mine-lights.alwaysShowCompass.too:
If enabled, the compass effect shall ever show the standard compass
(pointing to the world's nativity), e'en if thou hast none.
It shall be overruled shouldst thou take up any compass.
option.mine-lights.compassPriority.toolt: Determineth which compass to show if thy satchel holds many kinds.
option.mine-lights.highlightMovementKeys: Make Bright the Keys of Movement
Maketh bright the keys of WASD, Sprint, Sneak, and Jump.
option.mine-lights.enableBiomeEffects: Showeth the Colours of the Land
option.mine-lights.enableBiomeEffects.to: Setteth a base keyboard colour from the very land where thou dost stand.
Addeth the lights of rain and tempest.
option.mine-lights.enableInWaterEffect.t: Maketh bright the movement keys with a blue hue when thou art submerged.
minelights.gui.download.title: MineLights Server Doth Be Required
minelights.gui.download.prompt_missing:
Lo! The MineLights.exe file is absent from thy mods/MineLights folder. Without it, the mod shall not function.

Wouldst thou have it fetched anon?
minelights.gui.download.prompt_not_runni:
The MineLights Server runneth not. This mod requireth it to command thine RGB devices.

Shall I procure it forthwith?
minelights.gui.download.info: Fetching the MineLights server application most requisite.
